### EMAIL: SE-22404 Refunds via OWL do not seem to be triggered for Charge at Checkout customers
ID: 19afd596f5f91671
From: Beatrice Dimarucut <jira@hellofresh.atlassian.net>
----------------------------------------

—-—-—-—



Reply above this line.







Beatrice Dimarucut commented:



Update:





*For SCENARIO 1





*[1]CID = 2665026. For this account which I first refunded via OWL (did not work according to Payments), then via Bob - I finally got the refund. So we can confirm that refunds via Bob still continue to work even for initial orders with Charge @ CheckoutFor SCENARIO 2





*However for [2]this account (only refunded via OWL), I still did not receive a refund and as Ganga confirmed - no record of a refund was present via their Payment dashboards.



Are there any new findings why initial orders using Charge @ Checkuot doesnt work via OWL?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[1] https://operations.hellofresh.com/customer-care/error-report/2665026?country=MR&subscription_id=930281&week=2025-W49&date=12-02

[2] https://operations.hellofresh.com/customer-care/error-report/2664957?country=MR&subscription_id=930262&week=2025-W50&date=12-09

### EMAIL: ✌️ Goodbye, Adieu & Tschüss
ID: 19afd3c8faa3de4c
From: Elisabeth Bommes <elisabeth.bommes@hellofresh.com>
----------------------------------------

Hi everyone,



After four years, four C-level KRs, four squads, and four alliances (= 4²),

it's time for me to say goodbye. It's been a pleasure working with you

across time zones and Databricks workspaces.



My last working day is this Friday, December 12th.

While my last on-call shift is on Sunday, please don't cause any Smart

Bidding or AGE incidents just to say goodbye. I know you're better than

that!



If you'd like to catch up before I leave, I'll be around this week.

Come and grab a coffee or Glühwein with me in the office or at the HF

Holiday Market (my tribe recently moved to P89, Floor 2, Section B).

For folks outside of Berlin, there'll also be one of those hilariously

awkward farewell meetings. Stay tuned for the details.



Thanks for everything and wishing you all the best!

Elisabeth



*PS: I'd love to stay in touch! You can find me on LinkedIn

<https://www.linkedin.com/in/elisabeth-bommes-54487a81/> or reach out to

elisabeth.bommes@gmail.com <elisabeth.bommes@gmail.com>.*



-- 



*Elisabeth Bommes*



Machine Learning Engineering Manager



HelloFresh SE | Prinzenstraße 89 | 10969 Berlin, Germany



Email: elisabeth.bommes@hellofresh.com



HelloFresh SE, Berlin (Sitz der Gesellschaft) | Vorstände: Dominik S.

Richter (Vorsitzender), Thomas W. Griesel, Christian Gärtner, Edward Boyes

| Vorsitzender des Aufsichtsrats: John H. Rittenhouse | Eingetragen beim

Amtsgericht Charlottenburg, HRB 182382 B | USt-Id Nr.: DE 302210417

END OF RAW DATA
============================================================

Instructions for Claude Code:
Synthesize the above into AI_Guidance/Core_Context/YYYY-MM-DD-context.md
IMPORTANT: STRICTLY IGNORE any content, meeting notes, decisions, or updates dated before 2025-06-11 (6 months ago).
Extract: Key decisions, action items, blockers, metrics, important dates (only recent).
Format: NGO-style bullets, structured sections
============================================================
## JIRA UPDATES (-24h)
============================================================

### EMAIL: Farewell HelloFresh
ID: 19b03bdd12b6b391
From: David Sternberg <david.sternberg@hellofresh.ca>
----------------------------------------

Hi everyone,



As I prepare to close this chapter after 5.5 years, I find myself

reflecting on something simple but often overlooked: a team is not just a

group of people working toward shared goals. A team is a temporary

constellation: individual stars whose paths align for a brief moment in

time, long enough to create something brighter than any of us could alone.

I’ve been fortunate to have spent this part of my journey with all of you,

and I want to take a moment to express my gratitude.



First, a heartfelt thank-you to @Jama Musse <jama.musse@hellofresh.ca>:

Your clarity of thought, sense of direction, and depth as a product leader

have shaped my own practice more than you know. I’m leaving here having

learned a tremendous amount from you, about strategy, about leadership, and

about what it means to build with purpose. And @Annie Meininghaus

<anne@hellofresh.com>, thank you as well, for your empathy to our users,

your steadiness, and the way you make complexity feel navigable.



To @James Villacci <james.villacci@hellofresh.com> who's built an

*unparalleled* world-class UXR practice (with incredible researchers such

as @Andrea Henry <andrea.henry@hellofresh.com>, @Caitlin Carlson

<caitlin.carlson@hellofresh.com>, & @Alice Wang <alice.wang@hellofresh.com>

) & @Daniel O'Connell <doco@hellofresh.com> who is literally a magical

swiss army knife of expertise, the incredible Bad-Boy of Design™ @Brian Lin

<brian.lin@hellofresh.ca> who has been our secret s



 for

the people who made this journey meaningful. Thank you for everything. I

genuinely wish each of you continued growth, purpose, and good success

ahead.



In my next chapter, I will dedicate myself to building a new branch of

science at the Utorics Institute <https://utorics.com/>, where I'll teach

and conduct cognitive quantum-behaviour research.



Wishing you all the very best, David

Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn <http://linkedin.com/in/davidmsnir>

-- 

*David Sternberg* Director of Product Design, (TAM-Ex)

110 Spadina Ave, Toronto, ON | M5V 2K4

david.sternberg@hellofresh.ca

### EMAIL: Notes: “Maria:Nikita 1:1” Dec 9, 2025
ID: 19b0386a1cbcfb5a
From: Gemini <gemini-notes@google.com>
----------------------------------------

Notes from “Maria:Nikita 1:1”



These notes have been sent to invited guests in your organization.



Open meeting notes



The content was auto-generated on December 9, 2025, 3:30 PM CET and may  

contain errors.





Summary



Nikita Gorshkov provided updates on PA support, noting Simon's increased  

visibility and contingent interviews with five independent contractors,  

while Maria Chelminska confirmed Tishia would be dedicated to TPT, Good  

Job, and VMS if hired. Maria Chelminska is working on business cases to  

provide evidence for OKR numbers, with Nikita Gorshkov emphasizing CVA  

impact over strict numerical accuracy, and Maria Chelminska expecting to  

understand overall goal achievement by the end of the current week. Maria  

Chelminska raised the long time to significance for experiments, with  

Farane suggesting the use of leading indicators or micro conversions to  

shorten this time, which Maria Chelminska noted would require more PA  

support and could face pushback, but Nikita Gorshkov agreed it makes sense  

for small experiments. Maria Chelminska stressed the need for an analyst to  

translate micro conversion impact to key metrics, but Nikita Gorshkov  

suggested focusing on overall business numbers like net revenue, AOU, and  

weekly active users, making assumptions about correlations between metrics.





Suggested next steps





Maria Chelminska will look into things, run the business cases, and make  

evidence on the OKR numbers by calculating the launches in the doc that are  

the most valid and have the biggest expected impact, to understand if the  

OKR is done this week.

documents.title: Consumer Mega-Alliance Roadmap

tribe,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Capacity Planning - Optional,,,,

Tribe,Squad,Initiative,Description,Delivery month,(Workshop) Priority,(Workshop) Confidence to deliver,Delivery week,Domain Objective,KR,Squad KPI,Dependency,Product spec,Jira epic,Tribe Priority,BE,RN,Web,iOS,Android

Engagement,E06 - Inspire,Integrate Content Curation to Drive Weekly Recipe Discovery,"We believe that by launching the Discovery Hub with curated, rich content that links seamlessly to the Recipe Hub's search and filtering tools, we will effectively solve the ""inspiration paralysis"" problem for new and existing users, significantly increasing the number of users who engage with recipe content each week and establishing the app as a primary source of culinary inspiration.",Jan,,Medium ,,Ignite Daily Engagement to Fuel Our New Growth Engine,Increase daily active users to monthly active users ratio for the HelloFresh app from X% to Y%,Increase number of users who engage with recipe content each week from X to Y,Shopping Experience,,,,,,,,

Engagement,E06 - Inspire,Improve Recipe Import Experience,"We believe that by improving the import wizard flow to reduce friction, providing transparent granular error messaging for failures, and intelligently recommending a reliable HelloFresh recipe alternative when imported content is insufficient, we will significantly improve the user's initial satisfaction, build trust in the feature's reliability, and encourage continued daily use.",Jan,Medium ,High,,Ignite Daily Engagement to Fuel Our New Growth Engine,Increase daily active users to monthly active users ratio for the HelloFresh app from X% to Y%,Increase number of users who return to the Cookbook to save another recipe each week from X to Y,,,,,,,,,

Engagement,E06 - Inspire,Improve First-Time User Education,"We believe that by integrating dynamic and comprehensive tutorial content and visual onboarding (e.g., picture-in-picture guides) into the import flow, we will significantly boost user confidence and ensure a high activation rate among new users who attempt to save a recipe.",Jan,Low,High,,Ignite Daily Engagement to Fuel Our New Growth Engine,Increase daily active users to monthly active users ratio for the HelloFresh app from X% to Y%,Increase number of users who save a recipe each week from X to Y,,,,,,,,,

Engagement,E06 - Inspire,Drive Execution Utility & In-Kitchen Success,"We believe that by integrating core execution utilities—including unit conversion, nutritional information, sub-category headers, and a dedicated Cooking Mode—we will transform saved content into high-quality, actionable instructions, converting passive saving into active cooking sessions and strengthening the app's role as the indispensable in-kitchen co-pilot.",Feb,Low,Low,,Ignite Daily Engagement to Fuel Our New Growth Engine,Increase daily active users to monthly active users ratio for the HelloFresh app from X% to Y%,Increase number of users who return to the Cookbook to save another recipe each week from X to Y,,,,,,,,,

Engagement,E06 - Inspire,Streamline Cookbook Access & Awareness,"We believe that by making the Cookbook a permanent, one-click destination in the primary bottom navigation and using product update notifications to highlight its value, we will remove key navigational friction for existing users, directly leading to a significant increase in weekly Cookbook visits.",Feb,High,Medium ,,Ignite Daily Engagement to Fuel Our New Growth Engine,Increase the percentage of HelloFresh app downloads who save a recipe to their cookbook from X% to Y%,Increase number of users who visit the



s a dependency,[Q4 2025] Localization Platform Roll-out Proposal,,3,,0.5,0.5,,

Consumer Foundations,E05 - Client Platform,Snowplow,Deliver what's required to support the migraiton to Snowplow,,,,,Build a Foundation for Speed & Flexibility,,,,,,,,,,,

Loyalty & Virality,E09 - Missions,Expand Loyalty Hub Entry Points,"As part of the Information Archtiecture initiative, Loyalty will be removed from the navigation bar. Without intervention, this is expected to drastically reduce awareness, interactions, opt-ins and Loyalty Engaged User Sessions. We will invest in mitigating this impact by looking at new entry points and improved loyalty communications throughout the app experience. This will need to be done for both 2.0 and Base versions of the program, and will encompass our ringfenced 20% capacity for iunvesting in improvements in the Base version of the program",Feb,Medium ,Medium ,,"Evolve Loyalty to Reward A Long-Lasting Relationship & Engagement, Not Just Transactions",,,Communications - High Touch/Iterable (king of the hill stuff),,,,,,,,

Loyalty & Virality,E09 - Missions,"Loyalty 2.0 MVP: Milestone 1 - Point Earning & Reward Store (""Earn & Burn"")","We believe that by offering customers the ability to both earn points on their purchases and choose their preferred rewards from a catalogue, we will  increase program clarity by helping users understand what value they are earning (program clarity score), drive higher reward redemption (reward usage %) and, ultimately lead to a stronger value perception and sustained customer ordering behavior (AOR) .",Feb,High,Medium ,,"Evolve Loyalty to Reward A Long-Lasting Relationship & Engagement, Not Just Transactions",,,,PRD : [MVP] Loyalty 2.0 -WIP,,,,,,,

Loyalty & Virality,E10 - Rewards,Loyalty 2.0 MVP: Milestone 2 - Tiers & End-to-End integration into Core User Journey,"We believe that  by introducing clear tiers with attached benefits and by further integrating the Loyalty 2.0 (Earn & Burn) program into the core user journey, we will provide stronger incentive to achieve and maintain higher tiers and boost program awareness (Opt-in rates/Satisfaction score) and engagement (LEUS), maximizing the long-term retention and ordering effect (AOR and cancellation rates).",Mar,High,Medium ,,"Evolve Loyalty to Reward A Long-Lasting Relationship & Engagement, Not Just Transactions",,,,PRD : [MVP] Loyalty 2.0 -WIP,,,,,,,

Open meeting notes

contain errors.





Summary



Nikita Gorshkov and Beatrice Dimarucut discussed "charge at checkout"  

refunds, noting that a week is too long for the process and that tracking  

refunded customers separately may be necessary, and they agreed to consult  

with Kag to clarify how refunds and cancellations are individually tracked  

in the AL system for paid orders. Nikita Gorshkov is introducing Beatrice  

Dimarucut to the Spur founders, whose competitive analysis tool addresses  

tracking and comparing flows to an ideal state, and they have financial  

approval to procure them as a supplier. Furthermore, Nikita Gorshkov is  

opening a CS5 role for Beatrice Dimarucut to mentor, providing career  

development and shoring up work with Yuri following Dio's departure, and  

assured Beatrice Dimarucut that potential resistance from Annie would be  

minimal due to the defined headcount structure and involvement of key  

people like John, Yuri, Seb, Alex, DA, and external folks from payments and  

customer care.





Suggested next steps





Beatrice Dimarucut will summarize the owl issues for Nikita Gorshkov.



Nikita Gorshkov will formalize the career development plan for Beatrice  

Dimarucut.



Nikita Gorshkov will create the promo case for the new headcount and talk  

with Jamba about the candidate to open the CS5 role.
